QuestData.Title: A Bad Deal
QuestData.Description:
<Carentan escaped!
Roko, the tortollan merchant who set up this deal in the first place, will want to know what happened.
When you last spoke, Roko said he would be heading to Boralus.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Roko in Tradewinds Market.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm. A scam, was it? You have my apologies for putting you in harm's way.$B$BThis man should be delivered to justice. He may be in hiding now, but I am very, very patient.
